description: MongoDB Prometheus Exporter Dashboard. A fork inspired from https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/2583 which is made to work well with https://github.com/percona/mongodb_exporter.

panels.description: mongodb_mongod_db_data_size_bytes The total size in bytes of the uncompressed data held in this database
panels.title: Databases Size

panels.description: # HELP mongodb_mongod_db_index_size_bytes The total size in bytes of all indexes created on this database
panels.title: Indexes Size

panels.description: # HELP mongodb_mongod_db_indexes_total Contains a count of the total number of indexes across all collections in the database
panels.title: Total Number of Indexes

panels.description: See which node is currently acting as the primary, secondary, ...
panels.title: Member State

alert.message:
A MongoDB oplog replication has been 5 minutes behind in its replication for more than 15 minutes.
Being able to fail over to a replica of your data is only useful if the data is up to date, so you need to know when that’s no longer the case!
alert.name: MongoDB Oplog lag alert

alert.message: MongoDB's average disk i/o utilization has been above 98% for 5 minutes
alert.name: MongoDB's Disk IO Utilization alert

title: MongoDB_aada
